title: Mood Music
description: Salvation City, a place of high technology and nuclear fallout, is not always a kind place to live. For two unusual men, it is cruel indeed. Doubting their own memories, suffering loss and pain, they struggle to discover their place and find each other.Status: Incomplete/DiscontinuedLast update: 02/11/2008Word count: approx. 252,668
author: Okori
